track.strDescriptionEN: "We Run the Night" is a song by Australian DJ and recording artist, Havana Brown, written and produced by Cassie Davis and Snob Scrilla of production duo More Mega. It was released for digital download on 29 April 2011 by Island Records (Universal Music Australia) as Brown's debut single. "We Run the Night" received a mixed to positive reception from critics. The song peaked at number five on the ARIA Singles Chart, and certified triple platinum by the Australian Recording Industry Association (ARIA). The RedOne remix of the song, featuring American rapper Pitbull, peaked at number 26 on the US Billboard Hot 100 and number one on the US Hot Dance Club Songs chart.
